title: Bug 116786: Library include should store relative path.
SR: When a library is included in a report design, the BIRT designer should generate and save the relative path for the library. For example, if my report design is located at $project/test and I include a library from $project/otherlib/lib1.rptlibrary, the BIRT designer should store the relative path as ../otherlib/lib1.rptlibrary.
